name: Team Spice of Pokemon - Under Purr-essure
name_original: Team Spice of Pokemon - Under Purr-essure
description:
Under Purr-essure

Description

It’s time to get into your submarine and assume the role of a feline adventurer, Lieutenant Bee, on a perilous underwater adventure alongside Captain Scott as they explore new depths and discover a haunting truth about deep-sea life!

Controls

W - Move up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Space/Mouse 1 - Shoot

F - SharkBlaster9000

Credits

Bradley Atkins UP889131 - Project Manager

Ricky James UP903258 - Programmer

Jack Dowell UP901505 - 3D Modelling

Jimmy Stedall UP904798 - 2D Art & Design
